Summary: I was at a park and I was a star like object above me moving very slow.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were taking my 6 month old little boy for a walk at the park in the evening. The time was 8pm in Riverside ca. We looked up and saw what seemed to be a star but it was moving across the sky. It was not a plane as there weren't any blinking lighs or sound coming from the object.
